txt.en: 'What interest have you with this river? Speak now.'
The Morgulduin River runs through Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should find tributaries into the Morgulduin and sample the water there.
The Morgulduin River runs through Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should sample the water of the Morgulduin, further upstream, past its tributaries.
Speak to Rauniel by the banks of the Morgulduin

'Faramir has asked me to continue studying the waters of the Morgulduin, but I have yet to learn what might be causing this corruption. You helped me retrieve river samples once before, might you do the same again? I am certain we will find the answers if we work together. Does a tributary passing through the city taint these waters, or does the problem lie near the river's source? Would you take water samples from nearby tributaries into the Morgulduin and a sample closer to the river's source for me? I would be most grateful for your assistance, my friend.'
'What interest have you with this river? Speak now, [placeholder].'
Gather water from a northern tributary into the Morgulduin
The water appears to be somewhat clean
Sample water from a tributary into the Morgulduin
Sample water from another tributary into the Morgulduin
The water appears to be somewhat clean
Gather water from a southern tributary into the Morgulduin
Rauniel can be found by the banks of the Morgulduin in northern Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should speak to the mysterious woman.
Gather water from the Morgulduin, further upstream
Arodor seeks to know more about the Morgulduin River. He is specifically interested in finding a way to cure its putrid waters.
Sample water from the Morgulduin closer to its source
Someone watches you as you examine the corrosive and vile waters
